title: Welcome to the Jungle Jobs Scraper
description: Extract job listings from Welcome to the Jungle with fast collection and built-in reliability fallback. Filter by keyword, location, contract type, and remote work options.

keyword.title: Search Keyword
keyword.description: Job title, skill, or keyword to search for (e.g., 'Software Engineer', 'Marketing Manager', 'Data Analyst', 'Frontend Developer'). Leave empty to search all jobs.

location.title: Country Code
location.description: Two-letter country code to filter jobs (e.g., 'US', 'GB', 'FR', 'DE'). Leave empty for worldwide results.

collectDetails.title: Collect Full Job Details
collectDetails.description: Visit each job page to extract complete descriptions and additional metadata. Note: Significantly increases runtime and cost.

results_wanted.title: Maximum Results
results_wanted.description: Maximum number of job listings to extract. Set a higher value to collect more jobs.

max_pages.title: Maximum Pages
max_pages.description: Safety limit on search result pages to process (prevents infinite loops).

proxyConfiguration.title: Proxy Configuration
proxyConfiguration.description: Configure proxy settings for reliable scraping. Datacenter proxies work well for most use cases. Use residential proxies if you encounter blocking.
